SKT_FIRST.name: Time for Treatment!
SKT_FIRST.true_desc:
Attacks an enemy and heals the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>7%</color>.
If the target is <color=#28d9ed>Poisoned</color>, activates Dual Attack from the ally with the highest Attack.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、残りHPが最も低い味方単体のHPを<color=#28d9ed>7%</color>回復する。\n対象が<color=#28d9ed>中毒</color>状態の場合、攻撃力が最も高い味方に連携を発生する。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr:
적을 공격하고 체력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군의 체력을 <color=#28d9ed>7%</color> 회복시킵니다.
대상이 <color=#28d9ed>중독</color> 상태라면 공격력이 가장 높은 아군의 협공을 발생시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh:
攻击敌人,使生命值最低的友军恢复<color=#28d9ed>7%</color>的生命值。
若目标处于<color=#28d9ed>中毒</color>状态,触发攻击力最高的友军进行夹攻。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Effects are applied to all allies

SKT_SECOND.name: Frail but Deadly
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Triggered Effect) When hit, counterattacks with <color=#28d9ed>Venomous Charm</color>. Upon Counterattack, attacks all enemies and with a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Poison</color> on targets for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\nAfter the attack, heals <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> <color=#28d9ed>Health</color> of all allies and grant all allies a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. The Barrier strength increases proportional to the target's Max Health.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: (発動効果)自分がダメージを受けた時、<color=#28d9ed>弱く致命的な者</color>として反撃する。反撃発動時に敵全体を攻撃し、<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で対象に<color=#28d9ed>中毒</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。\n攻撃後、味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>を<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>回復させ、味方全体に<color=#28d9ed>シールド</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。シールド量は対象の最大HPに応じてUPする。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: (발동 효과) 자신이 피격 시 <color=#28d9ed>나약하고 치명적인 자</color>로 반격합니다. 반격 발동 시 적 전체를 공격하고, <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> 확률로 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>중독</color>을 부여합니다.\n공격 후 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>회복시키고 아군 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>실드</color>를 부여합니다. 실드량은 대상의 최대 체력에 비례하여 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: (触发效果)自身受击时,以<color=#28d9ed>脆弱致命者</color>进行反击。触发反击时,攻击全体敌人,有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>概率对目标赋予<color=#28d9ed>中毒</color>,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。\n攻击后,使全体友军的<color=#28d9ed>生命值</color>恢复<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>,并对全体友军赋予<color=#28d9ed>护盾</color>,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。护盾值根据目标的生命值上限按比例提升。

5_jp: 中毒強化(効果抵抗無視)
5_zh: 中毒强化(无视效果抵抗)

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Pain is Truth
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Dispels all debuffs from all allies and grants <color=#28d9ed>Immunity</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. Then restores allies' Health by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color>. Also increases Earth allies' <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 味方全体のすべての弱体効果を解除し、<color=#28d9ed>免疫</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。そして、味方全体のHPを<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>回復する。さらに、地属性の味方の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>UPさせる。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 아군 전체의 모든 약화 효과를 해제하고 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>면역</color>을 부여합니다. 그리고 아군 전체의 체력을 <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> 회복시킵니다. 또한 지속성 아군의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> 증가시킵니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 解除全体友军的所有弱化效果,并赋予<color=#28d9ed>免疫</color>,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。同时使全体友军的生命值恢复<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>。此外,使土属性友军的<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>提升<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, grants all allies <color=#28d9ed>Find Weakness</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, heals the ally with the lowest <color=#28d9ed>Health</color> by <color=#28d9ed>13%</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(初手)</color>:攻撃後、味方全体に<color=#28d9ed>弱点攻略</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、残りHPが最も低い味方単体の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>を<color=#28d9ed>13%</color>回復する。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 스타터 효과</color> : 공격 후 아군 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>약점 공략</color>을 부여합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 체력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>13%</color> 회복시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携起始效果</color>:攻击后,对全体友军赋予<color=#28d9ed>弱点攻击</color>,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,使生命值最低的友军恢复<color=#28d9ed>13%</color><color=#28d9ed>的生命值</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
